common_errors.cause: File is not in ELF format (not Linux/Unix executable/library)
common_errors.solution: Use objdump for other formats. Check file type: file <binary>

common_errors.cause: File doesn't exist at specified path
common_errors.solution: Verify path and filename. Use tab completion.

common_errors.cause: Cannot read file due to permissions
common_errors.solution: Check file permissions. Use sudo if necessary.

common_errors.cause: Statically linked binary has no dynamic section
common_errors.solution: Use -a for all headers, or -s for symbol table. Dynamic info only for shared libs.

common_errors.error_pattern: Warning: Section .* was not dumped because it does not exist
common_errors.cause: Requested section doesn't exist in this binary
common_errors.solution: Use -S to list available sections first. Then request specific section.

common_errors.cause: Binary was compiled without debug info or was stripped
common_errors.solution: Rebuild with -g flag for debug info. Debug info may be in separate .debug file.

common_errors.cause: ELF file is incomplete or corrupted
common_errors.solution: File may be corrupted. Verify download. Rebuild if source available.

common_errors.cause: File is truncated or corrupted at specified offset
common_errors.solution: File appears damaged. Verify file integrity. Re-download or rebuild.

common_errors.cause: Debug info references missing/corrupted DWARF sections
common_errors.solution: Debug info may be incomplete. Rebuild with -g or get matching debug package.
